statements: SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT id, transaction_date, description FROM auditing_transactions WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT amount, description, compliance_status FROM auditing_transactions WHERE amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT id, reviewer_name FROM auditing_transactions ORDER BY reviewer_name
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, amount, description FROM auditing_transactions WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY id;
SELECT description, reviewer_name FROM auditing_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND reviewer_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM auditing_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM auditing_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM auditing_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM anti_corruption_laws WHERE law_name LIKE '%corruption%';
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM anti_corruption_laws ORDER BY law_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM auditing_transactions WHERE reviewed_by = 'John Doe'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM auditing_transactions
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT law_id, law_name FROM anti_corruption_laws
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT action, date_time FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT sender, receiver, amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT record_id, compliance_status, review_date FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'pending';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, user_id, date_time, action FROM audit_logs WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT sender, receiver, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT review_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM auditing_transactions WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_records WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT action_performed, details FROM audit_logs WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checklist WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM auditing_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employee_records WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY department ASC
SELECT action_performed, details FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 AND audit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, compliance_status FROM auditing_transactions WHERE compliance_status = TRUE OR amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT checklist_id, review_date, reviewer_id FROM compliance_checklist WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM auditing_transactions WHERE payer_name = 'Company A';
SELECT payer_name, payee_name FROM auditing_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit_log WHERE audit_result = 'Failed' ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_role FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT * FROM auditing_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT payer_name, payee_name, transaction_amount FROM auditing_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM anti_corruption_laws WHERE length(law_description) > 100;
SELECT officer_name, officer_role FROM compliance_officers WHERE officer_role LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, payer_name, payee_name FROM auditing_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
